func.title: SetLandscapePixel

param.name: x
param.desc: X position of the pixel to be set; relative coordinates in local calls

param.name: y
param.desc: Y position of the pixel to be set; relative coordinates in local calls

param.name: dwValue
param.desc: 32 bit color value of the pixel

func.desc: Sets a pixel in the landscape. Not available in the old 8 bit graphics system.

example.text: Colors the landscape pixel directly behind the calling object brown.
